solution_line_template: Every other tree is half the trees, so there will be {total_streets} / {every_other_divisor} = <<{total_streets}/{every_other_divisor}={fruit_trees}>>{fruit_trees} fruit trees planted.

The association is planting three kinds of fruit trees, so they will plant {fruit_trees} / {kinds_of_fruit_trees} = <<{fruit_trees}/{kinds_of_fruit_trees}={trees_per_kind}>>{trees_per_kind} of each kind of tree.
